national_id_incorrect: Invalid ID number. Please check and try again.
national_id_missing: ID number is missing. Please try again.
no_account_found_redirecting: No account found. Redirecting to sign up...
otp_required: Please enter the last 4 digits of the caller ID.
otp_sent_message: You will receive a phone call to {{phoneNumber}}. Please enter the last 4 digits of the caller ID below.
otp_sent_message_no_phone: You will receive a phone call. Please enter the last 4 digits of the caller ID below.
invalid_national_id_or_password: Invalid national ID or password. Please check your credentials.
account_is_temporarily_locked_due_to_too: Account is temporarily locked due to too many failed login attempts
account_does_not_have_a_password_set_ple: Account does not have a password set. Please use the forgot password flow to set one.
your_account_has_been_rejected_please_co: Your account has been rejected. Please contact support.
your_account_is_suspended_please_contact: Your account is suspended. Please contact support.
if_an_account_exists_with_this_national_: If an account exists with this national ID, a password reset code has been sent to your phone.
a_password_reset_code_has_been_sent_to_y: A password reset code has been sent to your phone via voice call.
password_reset_successfully_you_can_now_: Password reset successfully. You can now login with your new password.
your_account_has_been_approved_you_can_l: Your account has been approved. You can login now.
password_set_successfully_you_are_now_lo: Password set successfully. You are now logged in.
no_phone_number_found_for_account_error: No phone number found for this account
